item.description:
Save the date: May 12th, Longest Line Dance

Once again, we will dance on the baseball field prior to the Fisher Cats baseball game on Saturday, May 12th, forming the Longest Line Dance! Hope you can join us this year! Our goal is to wrap the whole baseball field at the Fisher Cats baseball stadium (Delta Dental Stadium in Manchester) we will be performing the line dance "Kerosene" $10 a ticket, includes admission and $4.00 goes to Melanoma research!

Saturday night at the Midnight Rodeo Bar, April 28th and May 5th we will be teaching the line dance "Kerosene"

There are lots of ways to help support this fundraiser event !!

1. Get the kids involved......they can lead the line dancers onto to the field in a mini parade lead by the Midnight Rodeo Bar stagecoach

2. Purchase a game ticket only

3. Make a donation.

Please see the attached registration form and informational flyer for more details.

Any questions, please e-mail dance@midnightrodeobar.comor call 603-703-8444

See you at Midnight................Rodeo Bar
item.how_to_find_us: you wont be able to miss us.....
item.name: LONGEST LINE DANCE-bring every able bodied person.....lets make this a success!
